questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'If she had studied harder, she _____ the exam.'
Choose the correct third conditional sentence.
options: If they would have left earlier, they caught the train.
If they had left earlier, they would have caught the train.
If they have left earlier, they would catch the train.
If they had left earlier, they will catch the train.
questions.answer: If they had left earlier, they would have caught the train.
